h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow
content: Go straight on past the white sacs, and then turn left. You'll see a bridge here and a building on the other side.

The content is as follows:
Go straight on past the white sacs, and then turn left. You'll see a bridge here and a building on the other side.
